name: React SPA
description: Modern React application with routing and state management

tasks.label: Routing Setup
tasks.description: Set up React Router with a basic route structure, including home and not-found pages.

tasks.label: State Management
tasks.description: Configure a global state management solution (Redux or Zustand) with an example slice/store.

tasks.label: API Layer
tasks.description: Implement a reusable API layer with a fetch wrapper for HTTP requests and basic error handling.

tasks.label: Base UI Components
tasks.description: Create shared base UI components such as Button, Layout, and Header for consistent design.

tasks.label: Styling
tasks.description: Configure global styles using CSS or Tailwind, including a base theme and reset/normalize.
